Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2009 06:27PM jeanjean_chang wrote: Dear all, thank you for your kind replies. My  IM node is found positive before the surgery but the doctor failed to take it out. He tried but took the wrong one. He said it's under the chestbone and near the aorta. I am arranged to have A/Cx3 dense dose and CMFx6 with 30 rads with targeted rads to the IM node area.  Will begin on April 13.  I google a lot here in Taiwan and find out my case is really rare. It's around 15%. It's only 1% to find it out earlier. IMLN seems like a grey area. Can anybody tell me what is SSD? I am not really familiar with these medical terms. Thank you!
Posts.Title: Am I stage II or Stage III jeanjean_chang nelia48
